TemplateSQL.FixedSQL:
SET NOCOUNT ON /* 매장문의사항저장 StoreContactSave */
DECLARE @IDX BIGINT = {0} , @STORE_CODE INT = {1} , @REG_DATE VARCHAR(15) = '{2}' , @NAME NVARCHAR(100) = N'{3}' , @EMAIL NVARCHAR(100) = N'{4}' , @PHONE NVARCHAR(100) = N'{5}' , @TITLE NVARCHAR(200) = N'{6}' , @CONTENT NVARCHAR(MAX) = N'{7}' , @REMARK NVARCHAR(200) = N'{8}' , @STATUS INT = N'{9}' , @INSERT_CODE INT = N'{10}' , @INSERT_DATE DATETIME = GETDATE() , @UPDATE_CODE INT = N'{10}' , @UPDATE_DATE DATETIME = GETDATE()
UPDATE T_STORE_CONTACT SET STORE_CODE = @STORE_CODE , REG_DATE = @REG_DATE , NAME = @NAME , EMAIL = @EMAIL , PHONE = @PHONE , TITLE = @TITLE , CONTENT = @CONTENT , REMARK = @REMARK , STATUS = @STATUS , UPDATE_CODE = @UPDATE_CODE , UPDATE_DATE = @UPDATE_DATE WHERE IDX = @IDX IF @@ROWCOUNT = 0 BEGIN INSERT INTO T_STORE_CONTACT (STORE_CODE, REG_DATE, NAME, EMAIL, PHONE , TITLE, CONTENT, REMARK, STATUS , INSERT_CODE, INSERT_DATE, UPDATE_CODE, UPDATE_DATE ) SELECT @STORE_CODE, @REG_DATE, @NAME, @EMAIL, @PHONE , @TITLE, @CONTENT, @REMARK, @STATUS , @INSERT_CODE, @INSERT_DATE, @UPDATE_CODE, @UPDATE_DATE END
SET NOCOUNT OFF
